TopicTitle: Hello all. I've been looking for a program like this for years.

Articles.Content: I remember playing an old educational game on a Mac over 15 years ago that let you create and launch rockets when I was in grade school. That was the first program that got me interested in programs with realistic physics engines. Over the years I've looked for and found programs that were ok, but I never found anything (that was good) that allowed for launching from a planet with an atmosphere, orbiting, and landing like this program allows for. I really look forward to seeing this game progress. It's a blast.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

Maybe I shouldn't plug another program here but if want something more technical but less fun take a look at Orbiter. Although I've had it for a monthe the learning curve is steep and I actually havent done much with it. This game is more fun and you can just take it out of the box and fire it up if you take my meaning.
Both games are excellent. I love the simplicity and the many combination that KSP allows. I really look forward to seeing the upcoming features list come to be.
